name: CityRacer
description:
Your competitors will do their best to stop you from reaching the top-but in this world, there is only one winner.

Use skills, high -end automotive technology and a large number of nitrite to fight with police and competitors. Everything is about you, your friends and various cars. Let's see what you can do in this new open world!

Game features:
-Sighbone graphic experience action
-1 from old models such as Toyota Supra to new models such as BMW M4, there are 13 cars to buy
-Buestable mode can play with your friends
-In improve the performance of your car (you can classify more than 20 parts, such as engines, suspensions, brakes, etc.)
-Chito World Map
-S for those who seek excitement, each car has a drift mode

what are you waiting for? Enter this crazy world immediately!
